body_html:
Mostly its not related to VRAM (I am using latest TF with keras)
In first layer for a VGG like architecture
Convoulution3D(NumChannels, 3,3,3,)(inputs)

if I set NumChannels < 8, it crashes with the above message.
This somehow contradicting with waTeim

body:
Mostly its not related to VRAM (I am using latest TF with keras)
In first layer for a VGG like architecture 
`Convoulution3D(NumChannels, 3,3,3,)(inputs)`

if I set **NumChannels < 8**, it crashes with the above message. 
This somehow contradicting with [waTeim ](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/2190)
